duly.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: in the proper or expected way
duly.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Here are your travel documents, all duly signed.
duly.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: at the proper time or as expected
duly.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The Queen duly appeared on the balcony to wave to the crowds.
duly.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: in the proper, expected, or legal way
duly.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: State officials were duly authorized by the state legislature to enter into the agreement.
